abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 165		INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN CRAIG SCHMID   An ordinance authorizing and directing the Director of the Department of Human Services, via the Homeless Services Division (HSD), on behalf of the City of St. Louis, to accept a Grant Agreement Award from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) from the 2012 Continuum of Care Grant Application in the amount of $121,207.00, and to expend those planning grant funding funds to accomplish and further the work of the Continuum of Care (CoC) as indicated in the Continuum of Care Program regulation (Federal Register Vol. 77 No. 147 dated Tuesday, July 31, 2012) pertaining to CoC (24 CFR part 578.7(a)(9) and 24 CFR part 578.9 (a)(3)(ii) and (b) ) and the Grant Agreement Award (MO0177L7E011200) as attached as Exhibit A ; appropriating said funds and authorizing the Director of the Department of Human Services, upon approval of the Board of Estimate and Apportionment, to expend such funds as permitted by the Continuum of Care Program regulation (Federal Register Vol. 77 No. 147 dated Tuesday, July 31, 2012) pertaining to CoC (24 CFR part 578.7(a)(9) and 24 CFR part 578.9 (a)(3)(ii) and (b) ) and the Grant Agreement Award (MO0177L7E011200) ; and containing an Emergency Clause.
